data.title: 键入缺少的字母，完成下面的文字

However ____ longer ____ greater ____ 90 ____, ____ is ____ to ____ between 30-60g of ____ per ____. data.partBlankContent: What you eat during training will depend on the length of ride and intensity. For l__ intensity reco____ rides le__ than 1 hour th___ is n_ need f__ any ex___ carbohydrates. However f__ longer ri___ greater th__ 90 min____, i_ is recom______ to ha__ between 30-60g of carboh_______ per ho__. data.fullContent: What you eat during training will depend on the length of ride and intensity. For low intensity recovery rides less than 1 hour there is no need for any extra carbohydrates. However for longer rides greater than 90 minutes, it is recommended to have between 30-60g of carbohydrates per hour. Higher GI carbohydrates are a good choice as they are absorbed quicker, allowing for a quick energy supply to muscles.
data.answer: 你在训练中吃什么取决于骑行的长度和强度。对于1小时以内的低强度恢复，不需要任何额外的碳水化合物。然而，如果骑行时间超过90分钟，建议每小时摄入30-60克碳水化合物。高血糖指数的碳水化合物是一个很好的选择，因为它们吸收更快，允许快速的能量供应给肌肉。
